statements: UPDATE sustainable_farming SET certification_status = true WHERE farm_id = 1
UPDATE sustainable_farming SET farm_name = 'Organic Farm', location = 'California' WHERE farm_id = 2
UPDATE sustainable_farming SET location='California', certification_status=TRUE WHERE farm_id=1;
UPDATE sustainable_farming SET farm_name='Organic Farm', certification_status=FALSE WHERE location='New York';
UPDATE farming_practices SET practice_name='Organic Farming', certification_id=1 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE farming_practices SET practice_description='Sustainable farming methods', certification_id=2, practice_name='Sustainable Farming' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE farming_practices SET practice_description = 'Includes crop rotation, cover cropping, and integrated pest management' WHERE practice_name = 'Sustainable Farming'
UPDATE certifications SET expiration_date = '2023-12-31', certification_body = 'USDA' WHERE certification_name = 'Organic Farming'
UPDATE farm_practices SET description = 'New Description' WHERE practice_name = 'Agroforestry' AND certification_id = 1;
UPDATE farm_establishments SET location = 'New Location' WHERE establishment_name = 'Farm A';
UPDATE farm_practices SET description = 'Updated description', certification_id = 2 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE farm_establishments SET location = 'Updated location', establishment_name = 'Updated Name' WHERE certification_id = 3;
UPDATE Farmers SET certification_status = 'Certified' WHERE farmer_id = 101;
UPDATE Crops SET crop_type = 'Organic' WHERE crop_id = 201;
UPDATE Farmers SET location = 'New Location', certification_status = 'Active' WHERE farmer_id = 1;
UPDATE Crops SET crop_type = 'Organic' WHERE harvest_date < '2022-05-01';
UPDATE farm_info SET location = 'New Location', certification = 'Certified Organic' WHERE farm_id = 1;
UPDATE crop_info SET crop_type = 'Fruit', harvest_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE crop_id = 1;
UPDATE farm_info SET location='California', certification='Organic' WHERE farm_id=1;
UPDATE crop_info SET crop_type='Fruit', harvest_date='2022-09-15' WHERE crop_id=5;
